headline: Avast Makes AI-Driven Scam Defense Available for Free Worldwide
summary: Driven by a commitment to make cutting-edge scam protection available to everyone, Avast, a leader in digital security and privacy and part of Gen (NASDAQ: GEN), has unveiled Scam Guardian, a new AI-powered offering integrated into its award-winning1 Avast Free Antivirus.
